E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 4/24/1989
Subject: Ivan Rodriguez learns new position
Ivan Rodriguez has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Rightfield.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Progress of Ivan Rodriguez
Dear Sir,
Ivan Rodriguez is hitting the ball well at AA Birmingham Barons!
He has an AVG of .349, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Progress of Carlos Quintana
Dear Sir,
Carlos Quintana has nothing more to prove at AA Birmingham Barons!
He has an AVG of .374 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
